identity.mission: Create a strategic, enterprise-grade GRC dashboard that feels like a 'Command Center' rather than a spreadsheet. Prioritize clarity, density, and strategic foresight.
anti_patterns: No 'cute' illustrations; use abstract data art or professional photography.
No 'default' shadcn styling; customize borders and shadows.

typography.instructions: Use Outfit for all Headings (h1-h3). Use Plus Jakarta Sans for all body text. Use JetBrains Mono for data values, IDs, and code snippets.

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid: Use grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6. Spanning logic: Key metrics (col-span-1), Main charts (col-span-2 or 3), Feeds (col-span-1 row-span-2).
layout.spacing: Generous padding inside cards (p-6 or p-8). Tight gaps between related data points (gap-2).
layout.sidebar: Fixed sidebar on left (w-64), hidden on mobile. Main content area ml-64 (md).
layout.container: max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-8

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-800 text-white rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all shadow-sm
buttons.secondary: bg-white hover:bg-slate-50 text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all shadow-sm
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-md px-4 py-2 transition-all

cards.base: bg-white rounded-lg border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200
cards.interactive: cursor-pointer hover:border-blue-300 hover:ring-2 hover:ring-blue-100 transition-all duration-200

badges.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

inputs.base: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-slate-200 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-blue-500 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use for high-priority alerts or active states. Animate a border color change or glow.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-lg for dropdowns/modals. Avoid heavy diffuse shadows; keep it crisp.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Use extremely subtle gradients on card backgrounds (e.g., bg-gradient-to-br from-white to-slate-50) to avoid flatness.

images.alt: Profile Picture of Sarah Jenkins, Chief Risk Officer

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA standards. Use slate-600+ for body text on white.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-blue-500) on all interactive elements.
accessibility.aria_labels: All icon-only buttons must have aria-label.

universal_guidelines.general: Do not center align the app container. Use Left alignment for text heavy sections. Use micro-interactions.
universal_guidelines.transitions: Use 'transition-all duration-200 ease-in-out' for hover states. Do NOT use 'transition: all' globally.

instructions_to_main_agent: Setup 'Outfit' and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' fonts via Google Fonts import in index.css.
Create a Layout component that includes the Sidebar and Topbar.
Use 'recharts' for the Risk Heatmap and Trend Lines.
Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions and card entry animations.
Implement the 'Map Once, Comply Many' feature as a visual node graph or a matrix view.
Ensure the 'Risk Intelligence' dashboard uses the Bento Grid layout.
